scenario_text.value:
I’m sorry, Takuma.
I haven’t found anything yet.

I’m checking with the camera but nothing is
standing out.
It’s fine. Don’t rush.

You’re right. I need to stay calm. But the
panic never goes away...

Really? I couldn’t tell you were panicked.
I’m impressed, Saki.
Impressed? With what?

Compared to the beginning, you’re becoming
less emotional. Less of a victim.

You’ve learned how to think more calmly.
To take stock of the situation...

You think so?
I didn’t notice.

(She really is different than she was
before.)

(She still speaks casually, but I can see how
much she worries about everyone.)

(She doesn’t seem to be aware of the changes,
though.)
(I wonder what changed in her?)
She grew up?
She’s kinder now?
She’s less selfish?
She grew up?

You seem a little more grown up.
At ease with yourself?

You seem to be gentler when you panic or get
upset.
Right? She’s much more mature.

Even though sometimes she doesn’t like to let
on, she cares about everyone a lot.
She’s worried about us all. I can tell.
Really? I’m not sure what you mean.

As long as people stopped getting the wrong
idea about me...
She’s kinder now?

It’s like Saki is kinder now. How can I describe
it? She’s not selfish anymore?

What do you mean? It’s still me. You’re the
selfish one.

What? No! That’s not what I meant at all!
But maybe you’re right.
So rude! You’re right, though.

I guess I always thought things would work
out...

After talking with Floramon, I thought
I could just let go for a bit.

And instead of hoping things work out...
I make them work out.
Saki... You’ve really matured.
You think so? I don’t really see it.
She’s less selfish?

You stopped being so selfish, I think.
And stopped yelling at everyone.

What do you mean by that? I’ve never yelled
at anyone!
That’s not what I mean...
Takuma probably means you’ve calmed down.

I can see how you’ve matured. I love the
person you’ve become.
I love this Saki too!
Really? I’m not sure what you mean.

But I guess it’s not a bad thing if people
are telling me they love me!

If I find something, I’ll let you know. Make
sure you come running if that happens!
